title: Statement by NSC Spokesperson Emily Horne on National Security Advisor Jake Sullivanâ€™s Call with Nikolay Patrushev, Secretary of the Russian Security Council | The White House
content: National Security Advisor Jake Sullivan spoke by phone today with Nikolay Patrushev, Secretary of the Russian Security Council. The two discussed a number of issues in the bilateral relationship, as well as regional and global matters of concern. Mr. Sullivan and Secretary Patrushev also discussed the prospect of a presidential summit between the United States and Russia and agreed to continue to stay in touch.###
